card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.

card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.

card.name: Confront the Past
card.text: Choose one — • Return target planeswalker card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Remove twice X loyalty counters from target planeswalker an opponent controls.

card.name: Dragonsguard Elite
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Dragonsguard Elite. {4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Dragonsguard Elite.

card.name: Dragonsguard Elite
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Dragonsguard Elite. {4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Dragonsguard Elite.

card.name: Eager First-Year
card.text: Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Eager First-Year gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Frostboil Snarl
card.text: As Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Furycalm Snarl
card.text: As Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Kasmina, Enigma Sage
card.text: Each other planeswalker you control has the loyalty abilities of Kasmina, Enigma Sage. +2: Scry 1. −X: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it. −8: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a color with this planeswalker, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Lorehold Apprentice
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, until end of turn, Spirit creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to each opponent."

card.name: Lorehold Command
card.text: Choose two — • Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token. • Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible and haste until end of turn. • Lorehold Command deals 3 damage to any target. Target player gains 3 life. • Sacrifice a permanent, then draw two cards.

card.name: Lorehold Command
card.text: Choose two — • Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token. • Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible and haste until end of turn. • Lorehold Command deals 3 damage to any target. Target player gains 3 life. • Sacrifice a permanent, then draw two cards.

card.name: Necroblossom Snarl
card.text: As Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Pest Summoning
card.text: Create two 1/1 black and green Pest creature tokens with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

card.name: Pop Quiz
card.text: Draw a card. Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

card.name: Prismari Apprentice
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Prismari Apprentice can't be blocked this. turn. If that spell has mana value 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Prismari Apprentice.

card.name: Prismari Command
card.text: Choose two — • Prismari Command deals 2 damage to any target. • Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards. • Target player creates a Treasure token. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Prismari Command
card.text: Choose two — • Prismari Command deals 2 damage to any target. • Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards. • Target player creates a Treasure token. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Professor Onyx
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. +1: You lose 1 life. Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. −3: Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls. −8: Each opponent may discard a card. If they don't, they lose 3 life. Repeat this process six more times.

card.name: Professor Onyx
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. +1: You lose 1 life. Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. −3: Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls. −8: Each opponent may discard a card. If they don't, they lose 3 life. Repeat this process six more times.

card.name: Professor of Symbology
card.text: When Professor of Symbology enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

card.name: Quandrix Apprentice
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put that card into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Quandrix Command
card.text: Choose two — • Return target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand. • Counter target artifact or enchantment spell. • Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. • Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Quandrix Command
card.text: Choose two — • Return target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand. • Counter target artifact or enchantment spell. • Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. • Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Shadrix Silverquill
card.text: Flying, double strike At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may choose two. Each mode must target a different player. • Target player creates a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. • Target player draws a card and loses 1 life. • Target player puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control.
